movies.name: The Boys
movies.description: A group of vigilantes set out to take down corrupt superheroes who abuse their superpowers.
movies.star: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr

movies.name: The Acolyte: Plan
movies.description: An investigation into a shocking crime spree pits a respected Jedi Master against a dangerous warrior from his past. As more clues emerge, they travel down a dark path where sinister forces reveal all is not what it seems...
movies.star: Amandla StenbergDafne KeenJodie Turner-Smith

movies.name: Hit Man
movies.description: A professor moonlighting as a hit man of sorts for his city police department, descends into dangerous, dubious territory when he finds himself attracted to a woman who enlists his services.
movies.star: Glen Powell, Adria Arjona, Austin Amelio

movies.name: Bridgerton
movies.description: The eight close-knit siblings of the Bridgerton family look for love and happiness in London high society.
movies.star: Nicola Coughlan, Claudia Jessie, Luke Thompson

movies.name: Bad Boys: Ride or Die
movies.description: This Summer, the world's favorite Bad Boys are back with their iconic mix of edge-of-your seat action and outrageous comedy but this time with a twist: Miami's finest are now on the run.
movies.star: Will Smith, Martin Lawrence, Vanessa Hudgens

movies.name: Inside Out 2
movies.description: Follows Riley, in her teenage years, encountering new emotions.
movies.star: Amy Poehler, Maya Hawke, Kensington Tallman

movies.name: House of the Dragon
movies.description: An internal succession war within House Targaryen at the height of its power, 172 years before the birth of Daenerys Targaryen.
movies.director: Ryan J. Condal, George R.R. Martin
movies.star: Matt Smith, Emma D'Arcy, Olivia Cooke

movies.name: Furiosa: A Mad Saga
movies.description: The origin story of renegade warrior Furiosa before her encounter and teamup with Mad Max.
movies.star: Anya Taylor-Joy, Chris Hemsworth, Tom Burke

movies.name: Under Paris
movies.description: To save Paris from a bloodbath, a grieving scientist is forced to face her tragic past when a giant shark appears in the Seine.
movies.star: Bérénice Bejo, Nassim LyesLéa Léviant

movies.name: Game of Thrones
movies.description: Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.
movies.star: Karl Urban, Jack Quaid, Antony Starr

movies.name: Dark Matter
movies.description: A man is abducted into an alternate version of his life. Amid the mind-bending landscape of lives he could've lived, he embarks on a harrowing journey to get back to his true family and save them from a most terrifying foe: himself.
movies.star: Joel Edgerton, Jennifer Connelly, Alice Braga

movies.name: Sweet Tooth
movies.description: A boy who is half human and half deer survives in a post-apocalyptic world with other hybrids.
movies.star: Nonso Anozie, Christian Convery, Stefania LaVie Owen

movies.name: Fallout
movies.description: In a future, post-apocalyptic Los Angeles brought about by nuclear decimation, citizens must live in underground bunkers to protect themselves from radiation, mutants and bandits.
movies.star: Ella Purnell, Aaron Moten, Walton Goggins

movies.name: The Fall Guy
movies.description: A down-and-out stuntman must find the missing star of his ex-girlfriend's blockbuster film.
movies.star: Ryan Gosling, Emily Blunt, Aaron Taylor-Johnson

movies.name: Your Honor
movies.description: A judge confronts his convictions when his son is involved in a hit-and-run that embroils an organized-crime family.
movies.star: Bryan Cranston, Hope Davis, Michael Stuhlbarg

movies.name: Godzilla Minus One
movies.description: Post-war Japan is at its lowest point when a new crisis emerges in the form of a giant monster, baptized in the horrific power of the atomic bomb.
movies.star: Minami Hamabe, Ryunosuke Kamiki, Munetaka Aoki

movies.name: Civil War
movies.description: A journey across a dystopian future America, following a team of military-embedded journalists as they race against time to reach DC before rebel factions descend upon the White House.
movies.star: Kirsten Dunst, Wagner Moura, Cailee Spaeny

movies.name: Criminal Minds
movies.description: A group of criminal profilers who work for the FBI as members of its Behavioral Analysis Unit (BAU) using behavioral analysis and profiling to help investigate crimes and find the suspect known as the unsub.
movies.star: Kirsten Vangsness, Matthew Gray, GublerA.J. Cook

movies.name: Inside Out
movies.description: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.
movies.star: Amy PoehlerBill HaderLewis Black

movies.name: Mayor of Kingstown
movies.description: The McLusky family are power brokers tackling themes of systemic racism, corruption and inequality in Kingstown, Michigan, where the business of incarceration is the only thriving industry.
movies.star: Jeremy Renner, Hugh Dillon, Tobi Bamtefa

movies.name: The Abyss of Life
movies.description: Toranaga's defeated clan moves to Edo; Blackthorne must decide who he fights for.
movies.star: Hiroyuki Sanada, Cosmo Jarvis, Anna Sawai

movies.name: Dune: Part Two
movies.description: Paul Atreides unites with Chani and the Fremen while seeking revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.
movies.star: Timothée Chalamet, Zendaya, Rebecca Ferguson

movies.name: Ape Planet Kingdom
movies.description: Many years after the reign of Caesar, a young ape goes on a journey that will lead him to question everything he's been taught about the past and make choices that will define a future for apes and humans alike.
movies.star: Owen Teague, Freya Allan, Kevin Durand

movies.name: Strangers: Chapter 1
movies.description: After their car breaks down in an eerie small town, a young couple is forced to spend the night in a remote cabin. Panic ensues as they are terrorized by three masked strangers who strike with no mercy and seemingly no motive.
movies.star: Madelaine Petsch, Ryan Bown, Matus Lajcak

movies.name: The Bear
movies.description: A young chef from the fine dining world returns to Chicago to run his family's sandwich shop.
movies.star: Jeremy Allen White, Ebon Moss-Bachrach, Ayo Edebiri
